actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture with amendment, H. Rept. 95-628.

official_title: A bill to provide for emergency allotment lease and transfer of tobacco allotments or quotas for 1977 in certain disaster areas in South Carolina.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture with amendment, H. Rept. 95-628) Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to permit the owner and operator of any farm within specified counties of South Carolina, which has suffered as the result of a natural disaster a loss of ten percent or more in the number of acres of tobacco planted of such crop (or expected production from the planted acreage) to lease all or any part of such allotment or quota to any other owners or operators in the same county, or other counties within the same State, for use in such counties for the year 1977 on a farm or farms having a current tobacco allotment or quota of the same kind.

titles.title: A bill to provide for emergency allotment lease and transfer of tobacco allotments or quotas for 1977 in certain disaster areas in South Carolina.
